quote.author: Helen Keller
quote.content: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

quote.author: Oscar Wilde
quote.content: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.

quote.author: Aristotle
quote.content: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

quote.author: Maya Angelou
quote.content: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.

quote.author: Joseph Campbell
quote.content: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.

quote.author: Audrey Hepburn
quote.content: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!

quote.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote.content: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

quote.author: Buddha
quote.content: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.

quote.author: Edmund Burke
quote.content: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.

quote.author: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
quote.content: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote.content: Where there is love there is life.

quote.author: Aristotle
quote.content: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.

quote.author: Muriel Strode
quote.content: I will not follow where the path may lead, but I will go where there is no path, and I will leave a trail.

quote.author: Winston Churchill
quote.content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

quote.author: Og Mandino
quote.content: Do all things with love.

quote.author: Albert Camus
quote.content: Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken.

quote.author: Loretta Young
quote.content: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.

quote.author: Robert Frost
quote.content: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.

quote.author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote.content: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

quote.author: Nelson Mandela
quote.content: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

quote.author: Dr. Seuss
quote.content: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!

quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote.content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quote.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote.content: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quote.author: William Arthur Ward
quote.content: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.

quote.author: Democritus
quote.content: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.

quote.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quote.content: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'

quote.author: John F. Kennedy
quote.content: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.

quote.author: Judy Garland
quote.content: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
